page.title: 10Entertainment
page.content: The nearby towns of St.Albans and Watford provide varied kinds of entertainment-cinemas,theatres,discos restaurants and pubs.In the villages in our area,there are just public houses (pubs).Only grown ups can go inside to drink beer,wine or spirits,but if the pub has a garden, children are allowed to go there with their parents.These pubs,which have gardens, are popular with families: The Blackboy,The Fox and Hounds and The Old Fox, all in Bricket Wood;The Black Horse in Colney Street. In the summer, families go for walks through the common and end up at the Old Fox.
